title: Wallet Tab with Tickets *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User's account has tickets available within their account

Acct that typically as many ticketed events (as of July 2021) 
* Staging(or Prod) / justin.charschan@mlb.com / MLBmlb123
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_expected:
THEN wallet tab displays the tickets on user account

WIKI https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1WithTickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Event Cards will be displayed in the Wallet section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has tickets to 6+ events
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user sees the the next five upcoming events displayed with individual cards
AND the events will be sorted by date, in ascending order

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the wallet card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the Wallet card background will be the image as specified in the video poster URL supplied in ticket summary.  
* If video poster URL is null or an invalid URL, the card background will be the home team's default color.

[if TICKET is GAME EVENT]
AND The home team's logo will be displayed to the right of the event matchup 

[if TICKET is NON-GAME EVENT]
AND The home team's logo will NOT be displayed to the right of the event matchup

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user views the Wallet Card
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the event information will contain The event date / time in the format (Ex. Sat, Jun 22 . 1:07 PM ET)
AND beneath the date time will be the Matchup Info displayed as Away Team @ Home Team **
AND below the Matchup will be the Event's Venue

**if non-game event, then matchup string is replaced with title of the NGE

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user scrolls to the top of the Wallet View
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN there will be a "View All" link
AND there will be a "Refresh" link

title: Wallet Display - Initial Load of Ticket Summaries  *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user's account has at least one ticket available in inventory which has been cached
AND the user does not have network available OR service is down
custom_steps: WHEN the user starts the app to initiate initial load of tickets
custom_expected: THEN the tickets should show up since they were cached

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the wallet tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tickets should show up since they were cached

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the server response is not a 2xx (i.e 500)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the snackbar should pop up asking to retry
AND cached tickets should be displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is no Internet Connectivity
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the snackbar should display toast that there is no network connectivity
AND cached tickets should be displayed

title: Wallet Tab Deep Link
custom_preconds: GIVEN As a Ballpark user, I want to be able to open a link that takes me directly to where all my upcoming tickets and offers are accessible so I can manage my upcoming tickets and redeem offers
custom_steps: Open the link specified in https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226449/Linking+Deep+Linking+and+Routing

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User clicks on ballpark://wallet in Slack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ballpark App is launched and the Wallet Tab is displayed

title: Tickets - Verified/Unverified Account *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has tickets available within their account

[BPA-6152](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6152)
[BP-9320](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9320)

*Testing Notes:[How to test Ballpark Features with an Unverified Account with Tickets](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/BET/pages/2587656220/How+to+test+Ballpark+Features+with+an+Unverified+Account+with+Tickets)
custom_steps:
WHEN user's account is verified OR unverified
WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_expected: THEN I will see a CTA that indicates user can tap to refresh my tickets

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets available within their account
WHEN user's account is verified
AND the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see Refresh link that indicates user can tap to refresh tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Refresh link on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true) 
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets available within their account
WHEN user's account is unverified
AND the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see Refresh link that indicates user can tap to refresh tickets
AND the unverified event card is shown on the Tickets page with a button directing 'Verify Email to Open Tickets'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Refresh link on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true) 
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)

title: No Tickets - Verified Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has no tickets 
AND their primary IS verified (wallet notification: 'noTixForVerifiedEmails') 

https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6151
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9319
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_expected:
THEN user will see messaging about tickets not found
AND user will be presented 2 CTAs, 'Refresh My Tickets' first followed by 'Verify Email Address'


Mock: https://app.zeplin.io/project/60084d562ce7d2bf44bf7902/screen/60d2157244707c1723a9c710

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will see 'Cannot find any tickets' followed by subtext 'Please refresh your tickets or verify additional email addresses used to purchase tickets.

AND user is shown first CTA - 'Refresh My Tickets' button with blue background and white text
AND user is shown second CTA - 'Verify Email Address' button with white background and blue text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Refresh My Tickets' button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true) 
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Verify Email Address' button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the My MLB Account Emails page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user back navigates from the My MLB Account Emails page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to the Tickets tab

title: No Tickets - Unverified Account
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has no tickets
AND their primary NOT verified (wallet notification: 'suggestCompleteEmailVerification') 

https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6151
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9319
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_expected:
THEN user will see messaging about tickets not found
AND user will be presented 2 CTAs, 'Verify Email Address' first followed by 'Refresh My Tickets'

Mock: https://app.zeplin.io/project/60084d562ce7d2bf44bf7902/screen/60d215722b986310ab22e3ea

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN a new user is onboarded

(using a valid email to allow for verification of account)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the Home page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see 'Cannot find any tickets' followed by subtext 'Please verify your email address or refresh your tickets.'
AND user is shown first CTA - 'Verify Email Address' button with blue background and white text
AND user is shown second CTA - 'Refresh My Tickets' button with white background and blue text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Refresh My Tickets' button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true)
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Verify Email Address' button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the My MLB Account Emails page with a message 'The email is not verified for ticket access'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user back navigates from the My MLB Account Emails page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is returned to the Tickets tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps on 'Verify Email Address' button on the Wallet Tab
AND the user taps 'Resend'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown prompt: 
'Verification Email Sent
Please check your inbox at <onboarded_email_acct>'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens their preferred email client
AND confirms the verification of the account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown 'Email Successfully Verified' page in browser

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user back navigates from the My MLB Account Emails page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user will see 'Cannot find any tickets' page **

Android: 
AND user is shown first CTA - 'Refresh My Tickets' button with blue background and white text
AND user is shown second CTA - 'Verify Email Address' button with white background and blue text

iOS: 
AND user is shown first CTA - 'Verify Email Address' button with blue background and white text
AND user is shown second CTA - 'Refresh My Tickets' button with white background and blue text

** NOTE: iOS may need to revisit My MLB Account page and then return to Tickets tab to reflect the change (order of buttons)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'Refresh My Tickets' button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN users triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true)
AND user is maintained on the Tickets page

title: Refresh CTA limitation *[requires tickets, proxy/configuration]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is on the wallet tab (w/ or w/o tickets)


https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6153
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9324
custom_steps: WHEN user has just tapped on refresh cta or swipe refresh
custom_expected:
THEN user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time (i.e. do not make API call)

'prevented' is a disabled and gray Refresh cta 
* with tickets: WALLET one ticket disabled - https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/60d4a7f6f120a6089c5cb1b0
* no tickets: WALLET no tickets no verify disabled - https://app.zeplin.io/project/602160fce3c37f64b50c8127/screen/60d4a7fa47749bb1c9d12151

'configurable amount of time' is controlled by 'ticket_refresh_timeout' within the remote config (https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
** NOTE: updating the remote config may take some time to reflect within BP app (can be > 5mins)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user has tickets available within their account
WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see Refresh link that indicates user can tap to refresh tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Refresh link on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true)
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)
AND user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time (i.e. do not make API call)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to a larger number than what is defaulted (i.e. 30)
AND the user taps on Refresh link on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time entered (i.e. do not make API call)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to 0
AND the user taps on Refresh link on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should not be prevented from refreshing again, as the configurable amount of time entered is set to 0

(button should not be disabled, after tapping)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to default value (i.e. 5)
GIVEN user has no tickets available within their account
WHEN the user navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I will see Refresh button that indicates user can tap to refresh tickets

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on Refresh button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true)
(Using Charles, verify request has true value set for refresh)
AND user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time (i.e. do not make API call)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to a larger number than what is defaulted (i.e. 30)
AND the user taps on Refresh button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time entered (i.e. do not make API call)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to 0
AND the user taps on Refresh button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should not be prevented from refreshing again, as the configurable amount of time entered is set to 0

(button should not be disabled, after tapping)

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN an engineer update the ticket_refresh_timeout to default value (i.e. 5)
AND the user taps on Refresh button on the Wallet Tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user triggers a search for tickets for all teams (refresh=true)
AND user will be prevented from refreshing again for a remote configurable amount of time (i.e. do not make API call)

title: 'View All' Screen  *[requires tickets]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to Wallet tab and has at least one ticket

Acct that typically as many ticketed events (as of July 2021)
* Staging(or Prod) / justin.charschan@mlb.com / MLBmlb123
custom_expected: WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.1MyTickets-Viewall

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on 'View All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display all ticketed events as individual rows
AND the app will display each game row including away team at home team, event start time local, venue name, description (if available)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has many ticketed events
AND the user is on the Tickets Tab
AND the user taps on 'View All'
AND the user scrolls through the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the month and year will be "sticky" headers and the event day of week and day number will be displayed along in the left

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has at least one NGE ticketed events
AND the user is on the Tickets Tab
AND the user taps on 'View All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display each NGE row including NGE description, event start time local, venue name

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps on "View All"
AND the user taps anywhere on a item in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app will display list of tickets for the tapped ticketed entry

title: Display events with no display date under "Other" in ViewAll  *[requires tickets, proxy]
custom_preconds:
When ticket items have no valid displaySummary date, they should be displayed as an other category at the end list

GIVEN we use Charles to rewrite "displaySummary" for tickets in the wallet

			"displaySummary": {
				"date": "",
				"time": "",
				"venue": "T-Mobile Park",
				"desc": ""
			}

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects the wallet tab AND "View All" button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ticket with the missing or invalid date should be under "Other" heading in the ticket view list.

title: Trigger Email Verification Success
custom_preconds:
Given an event that requires verification 

*Testing Notes:[How to test Ballpark Features with an Unverified Account with Tickets](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/BET/pages/2587656220/How+to+test+Ballpark+Features+with+an+Unverified+Account+with+Tickets)

![](index.php?/attachments/get/24185)
custom_steps: When the user taps on the event
custom_expected:
Then the user gets an email and the app shows a message that an email was sent 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24186)

WIKI:[Verify Email Wallet - Email Successfully Sent](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/19727697/Verify+Email#Wallet---Email-Successfully-Sent)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user with MLB account with unverified account having tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the Tickets Tab
AND the user taps on 'View All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown My Tickets page with an entry with 'Verify' and exclamation icon, where ticket counts is usually shown.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the 'Verify' button 
AND the user taps 'Verify Email to Open Tickets!"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a message that slides on the button of the Wallet page demonstrating successful email sent - "An email has been sent to bparkdev@gmail.com"
AND 'Go To My Account' button below the text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Go To My Account' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is directed to My MLB Accounts page

![](index.php?/attachments/get/24184)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on the back arrow from MY MLB Account Page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to Wallet Details list view

title: Trigger Email Verification Failure
custom_preconds:
Given an event that requires verification

*Testing Notes:[How to test Ballpark Features with an Unverified Account with Tickets](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/BET/pages/2587656220/How+to+test+Ballpark+Features+with+an+Unverified+Account+with+Tickets)


![](index.php?/attachments/get/24188)

** Charles setup **

Block the URL similar to: https://profile.mlb.com/api/v1/verification/emails.
custom_steps: When the user taps on the event, but the api call to the address verification service fails
custom_expected:
The app shows a dialog that informs the user there was an error with the ability to retry the api call
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24187)

WIKI:[Verify Email Wallet - View All Events - Unverified Primary Alert](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/19727697/Verify+Email#Wallet-View-All-Events----Unverified-primary---Alert)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user with MLB account with unverified account having tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the Tickets Tab
AND the user taps on 'View All'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown My Tickets page with an entry with 'Verify' and exclamation icon, where ticket counts is usually shown.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps the 'Verify' button 
BUT the api call to the address verification service fails (using Charles to prevent the response)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is displayed a prompt with error message:
"Verification Email Not Sent
Due to technical issues a verification email could not be sent"

title: Ticket List Interface
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user with tickets in their Acct is logged into BP
AND user taps Ticket Tab
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on a matchup entry
custom_expected:
WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.4TicketList-Forwardvia...

THEN Wallet displays with My tickets page with all tickets in the account

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a matchups that does NOT have forwards completed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display Tickets in top header

AND the app will display the matchup data in sub header (cap logo away and home, away team @ home team, date and start time, venue name)

** if NGE do not display logos and show NGE description instead of team name
AND the app will display headers for section, seat and row
AND the app will display each ticket as its own row with section, seat and row values
AND the app will display "Open" link button for each row

AND the app will display the "Forward Tickets" button at the bottom (above the Navbar)

['Sell Tickets' button may also be shown]

AND everything on this view will scroll
BUT the header & buttons at the bottom will not scroll

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on a matchups that has forwards completed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display Tickets in top header

AND the app will display the matchup data in sub header (cap logo away and home, away team @ home team, date and start time, venue name)
AND the app will display headers for section, seat and row
AND the app will display each ticket as its own row with section, seat and row values

AND the app will display "Open" link button for each row for ticket that has NOT been forwarded 
AND the app will display "Recall" link button for each row for ticket that has been forwarded

AND the app will display the "Forward Tickets" button at the bottom (above the Navbar)

['Sell Tickets' button may also be shown]

title: Ticket List Status Icons
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has clicked on a matchup in the wallet.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN A ticket is pending a forward
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a yellow forward icon should be displayed to the left of the cell

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN A ticket has completed a forward
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a green forward icon should be displayed to the left of the cell

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN A ticket has been scanned 
(can use CharlesProxy with a breakpoint set and changing 'scanned' to true in the response to simulate a scanned ticket)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a grey scanned icon should be displayed to the left of the cell

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN A ticket is not in a forward state and has been unscanned
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN no icon should be displayed

title: Ticket List Status Text  *[requires tickets, proxy]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND the user has a ticket with associated status text given by 'displayStatusString' in ticket response

Testing Notes:
*Tickets in a forward state (pending, accepted, etc) will have 'displayStatusString' within the BoxOffice Tickets response (https://stage.boxoffice.mlb.com/api/v2/users/ )
*CharlesProxy can be utilized to modify the response and add an entry for 'displayStatusString'
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on a matchup in the wallet
custom_expected: THEN the text should appear just below the ticket. If that field is empty or does not exist, nothing should be displayed.

title: Ticket List Inline Actions
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has clicked on a matchup in the wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN the user has a pending forward ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ticket should have a Cancel button at the end of the cell.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN the user has a completed forward ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ticket should have a Recall button at the end of the cell.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN the user has a non forwarded ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ticket should have a Open button at the end of the cell that takes the user to the scan view.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN the user clicks Cancel/Recall
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN an alert will be displayed asking the user to confirm the action (with corresponding text depending if its cancel/recall).

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN user selects NO on the cancel/recall alert
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN alert is dismissed

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN user selects YES on the cancel/recall alert
custom_steps_separated.expected: A request will be made to cancel/recall the ticket. If it is successful the ticket list should refresh, otherwise an error alert will display asking the user to try again.

title: Ticket List Header
custom_preconds: GIVEN user clicks on matchup in wallet

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN user has X tickets and none are in an accepted forward state
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN header should say "Tickets"

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN user has X tickets and Y forwards have been accepted
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN header should say "Tickets"

title: Ticket List Click On Row
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has tickets that can be shown on scan view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicking on row of ticket list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Scan view should be opened

title: Ticket Forward Recall  *[requires tickets, proxy/configuration]
custom_preconds:
User has completed a ticket forward but the club does not allow recalls
To test this: Remap ticket details response with "canRecall" : false in the sentForwards object
Load ticket list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User goes to ticket list view with at least one completed forward
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Ticket shows "Recall"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on "Recall" row (but not the link)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Scan View is presented but does not have "Recall" button

title: Ticket Scan View
custom_preconds: GIVEN User has events on account with both single and multiple tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the scan view
custom_expected:
WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.1TicketScanView

THEN the correct Scanview is shown without swiping capability and card does not move in ticket scan, if single ticket
OR
THEN the correct Scanview is shown with swiping capability and peeking to additional, if multiple tickets



On tap of close X, scan view slides down.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user has single ticketed event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the ticket is centered without any additional tickets peeking, neither to right or left
AND swiping has no effect

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has 2+ ticketed event
And user opens the scan view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 1st ticket is centered, 2nd ticket is peeking in from right

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user swipes the to the left to view the additional tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the 1st ticket is peeking out from the left
AND the 2nd ticket is now centered
AND additional ticket is peaking out from the right, if additional ticket exists

** for last card, no card will peek from the right, only cards will peek from left.

title: Event Info
custom_preconds:
WIKI : https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.2EventInfo

GIVEN As a user is logged in with multiple tickets for an event

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User opens the scan view of the tickets from Wallet Detail List
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the following information is displayed in the scan view header:
Date, Time: 
Match up: Away Team @ Home Team
Home team logo
Venue
Description (if available)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User swipes through their tickets
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN scan view header information remains displayed for each ticket

title: Ticket Card - Ticket Backgrounds
custom_preconds: GIVEN the ticket scan view is displayed
custom_expected: WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.4.1TicketCard-TicketBackgrounds

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN viewing a ticket a valid backgroundVidPoster
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background should be of the home teams ballpark

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN viewing a ticket with no backgroundVidPoster (Use Charles to do this)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the background should be the home teams primary color

title: Ticket Back
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are tickets in the wallet and displayed in Ticket Scan View
custom_expected: WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.7TicketBack

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN tapping a tickets information button in scan view
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the screen will display the "ticket back" screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN tapping Close from ticket back screen

title: Ticket Scan View - Tracking [iOS only]
custom_preconds:
[BP-9663](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9663):Scan View Analytics - Additional context data
**TESTING NOTES: THIS CASE REQUIRES TRACKING TO BE VERIFIED - MOST DIRECT WAY TO ACHIEVE THIS IS VIA A PROXY TOOL (.I.E. CharlesProxy)
Setup: Connect to device to Charles to monitor the content passed.

GIVEN user downloaded the Ballpark app (11.2.0 or greater)*
AND network traffic is monitored via Charles
AND user's acct has valid tickets in BP
AND the shared secret sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for a particular ticketed event
AND the shared secret NOT sent from ProVenue to BoxOffice for another particular ticketed event

*Rotating Barcode feature introduced with 11.1.0 build. Additional scanview tracking introduced with 11.2.0

(as of April 2022, the following satisfies shared secret being passed AND not being passed)
Env: QA
Acct: bparkdev+tdc2@gmail.com / MLBmlb123
Ticketed Event w/ shared secret: Orioles @ Guardians, Sept 1 (Tickets: Sec-LB129, Row-37, Seats-9,10)
Ticketed Event w/out shared secret: Astros @ Orioles, Sept 24 (no tickets with rotating barcode)

WIKI:[TicketScanView](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3226270/00+Ticket+Scan+View#id-00TicketScanView-1.1TicketScanView)

------
As reference for other features
*[Tracking - Screenshot detection [iOS]](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/28071269)
*[Add to Apple Wallet](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/cases/view/1281003)
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the scan view
custom_expected:
THEN the correct Scanview is shown 
AND the additional context are passed to analytics (for all scan view page views and actions)
*Venue ID of the event venueID
*Hometeam ID homeTeam
*gamepk or event ID of the ticket eventID
*Scan state boolean scanned

**Actions for:
*Add to Apple Wallet
*Screenshot and Screenshot Foul Ball (for more detail BP-9640)

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the scanview of the tickets are shown (with barcode NOT rotating)
AND Tracking info is posted to https://mlb.sc.omtrdc.net verified in Charles

title: Forwarding via Email - Interface
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user purchased tickets

AND the user selected tickets to forward

AND the user tapped on 'Forward Tickets' button
custom_expected: WIKI :https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.6Ticketlist-ForwardviaEmail

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app display the Ticket Forward email form

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user enters the information in the fields provided
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will validate the information provided by the user (the app will the emails standards: some text, an at symbol followed by a domain)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes the form and taps on 'Send'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will trigger the network call to send the selected tickets to the recipient email address entered by the user

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes the form and taps on 'Send'

THEN the app will display a success message

title: Forwarding via Suggested Recipients
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in, has tickets, has navigated to the Wallet -> Selected Event and click Forward Tickets -> Ticket Forwarding View
AND the user has completed forwards via email in the past
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks on "Forward"
custom_expected:
![](index.php?/attachments/get/7870161)
THEN the user will see at least 1 email in the options list

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps on an email
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a prompt is displayed that says "Ticket will be immediately delivered to [SELECTED_EMAIL] and available in their MLB Ballpark app" with the options Yes and No.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "Yes" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the prompt and view is dismissed back to the Ticket List view and the forward is either completed successfully or fails and the user is notified.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps the "No" option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the prompt is dismissed and the Ticket Forwarding View is still shown.

title: Forwarding via Contact List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the "Forward Tickets" screen

*device requires Contacts present in different states
**Just email address
**Just phone number
**Both phone number and email address
**No phone number nor email address (empty)
custom_expected: WIKI:[TicketList-ForwardviaLink](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.5TicketList-ForwardviaLink)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user taps 'Forward'/'Forward Tickets' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the list of options shown (below suggested recipients, if prev forwarded):
"Select from Contacts"
"Via Email"
"Share Link"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps "Forward Tickets" 
AND the user taps "Select from Contacts"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
*A device permission prompt could be shown to allow access to contacts

THEN the operating systems contact picker appears displaying the email address and phone numbers

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps "Forward Tickets" 
AND the user taps "Select from Contacts"
AND the user taps a contact with JUST an email address associated with the device contact
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app should navigate to the 'Ticket Forward Email'/'Forward Via Email' form with "Email" and "Name" fields populated from the contact

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes the form and taps on 'Send'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will trigger the network call to send the selected tickets to the recipient email address entered by the user
AND the app will display a success message

AND the form will slide down and return the user to the list view no longer in "Forward mode"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps "Forward Tickets" 
AND the user taps "Select from Contacts"
AND the user taps a contact with JUST a phone number associated with the device contact
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app should generate a share link and open an OS SMS message draft for the number with a message body:

[iOS] 
"I just forwarded you tickets, follow the link to accept them in MLB Ballpark app." that contains a link to accept transferred ticket(s)

[ANDROID] 
Contains a link to accept transferred ticket(s) 
*NOTE: Android will not be supplying additional text in the text message when sharing a link to forward the ticket. It has been deemed acceptable to have just the ticket link provided. [BPA-5423](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-5423?focusedCommentId=2712555)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user sends the SMS message containing the ticket share link
AND the user navigates back to BP app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is shown the list view, no longer in "Forward mode"
AND the app will display the transferred ticket as 'Forward pending via link'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps "Forward Tickets" 
AND the user taps "Select from Contacts"
AND the user taps a contact with BOTH an email address AND a phone number associated with the device contact
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app should navigate to the "Ticket Forward Email" form with "Email" and "Name" fields populated from the contact

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user completes the form and taps on 'Send'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the app will trigger the network call to send the selected tickets to the recipient email address entered by the user
AND the app will display a success message

AND the form will slide down and return the user to the list view no longer in "Forward mode"

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user taps "Forward Tickets" 
AND the user taps "Select from Contacts"
AND the user taps a contact without an email address NOR a phone number associated with the device contact
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the OS should appropriately handle a contact without a delivery method

*typically an 'invalid recipient' message OR Null message without ticket link generated/shown

title: Forwarding via Share Link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the sending user has forward-able tickets on their account



TESTING NOTES:
*This test case is best to be validated with 2 devices/accts to closer validate the true user experience. A single device can be used, but may be more difficult to verify.
*This test case is best to be validated against Prod env. This will prevent testing friction within QA/Staging env, due to beta prompt and requiring credentials. [MLB Beta Login page requiring creds (Username: beta-user / Password – b3ta@mlb.com)]
*In case you need to validate specifically in QA environment, take note that your device should be connected to the VPN to allow the share link to work.
custom_expected:
WIKI:[TicketList-ForwardviaLink](https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/mobile/pages/3225634/03+Wallet+Tab#id-03WalletTab-1.1.5TicketList-ForwardviaLink)

[BP-9681](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9681)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the sending user selected tickets to forward
AND the user tapped on 'Forward Tickets' button 
AND the user taps on 'Share Link'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will display the OS share sheet and make the API call to forward the ticket

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user selects one of the sharing apps/options
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app populate the user's device share option with the "shareURL" from the boxoffice service

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user finishes selecting share option of the ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the share flow will dismiss 
AND the user will no longer be in "Forward mode"

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the sending user finishes forwarding
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will refresh the list and will indicate which tickets are now forwarding in progress (pending via link)

custom_steps_separated.content:
*best to use a different device/acct

WHEN the receiving user accesses the share link
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be shown 'Accepting Tickets' page via mlb.com with an 'Access Ticket' button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the receiving user taps 'Access Ticket' button from within Accepting Tickets page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be presented 'Open in Ballpark?' prompt

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the receiving user taps 'Open' within 'Open in Ballpark?' prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the ballpark app will be opened to the Tickets tab
AND 'Ticket Accepted - You've received a ticket forward from <sending_user_email>.' with an 'OK' button
AND the prompt is layered on top of the WalletView displaying the ticketed events* 

*this assumes no prev tickets were active on the acct where the newly accepted transfer's card is shown. If prev ticketed events are prev on the acct AND if the events occurs prior to the transfer, then the soonest events are displayed.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the receiving user navigates to view the recently accepted ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user is able to see the listview AND the scanview of the ticketed event

*barcode should be shown, if prev shown from sending user ('Barcode Unavailable' can be shown initially to sending user, and therefore would be the same shown to the receiving user)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the sending user navigates/refreshes the recently forward ticket
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the ticket entry should be updated from 'Forward pending via link' to ticket has been accepted by the receiving user

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the tickets that have been selected should revert to an unforwarded state.

title: Trigger Email Verification Success
custom_preconds:
Given a Wallet event that requires verification![](index.php?/attachments/get/24177)

**To simulate Peeking card state('Verify Email To Open Tickets'), using Proxy tool the ticketSummaries response can be updated to have 'ticketCount' to 0, 'forwardCompletedCount' to 0, and 'verified' to false
custom_steps: When the user taps on the event
custom_expected: Then the user gets an email and the app shows a message that an email was sent.  The toast text should say "Go to your MLB Account" ![](index.php?/attachments/get/24178)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is in the Wallet Tab and click on "Verify My open tickets!" text
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user gets an email and the app shows a message that an email was sent.  The message should include button with text = "Go to your MLB Account" !

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user clicks on the Go to your MLB Account button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is taken to My MLB Account Emails screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates from MLB Account Emails page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to Wallet Tab

title: Trigger Email Verification Failure
custom_preconds:
Given a Wallet event that requires verification 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24177)

**To simulate Peeking card state('Verify Email To Open Tickets'), using Proxy tool the ticketSummaries response can be updated to have 'ticketCount' to 0, 'forwardCompletedCount' to 0, and 'verified' to false

**To simulate a failed response from email address verification, using Proxy tool add a breakpoint to the profile.mlb.com response and hold response from executing (or aborting response)
custom_steps: When the user taps on the event, but the api call to the address verification service fails
custom_expected:
The app shows a dialog that informs the user there was an error with the ability to retry the api call 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24181)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user is login to MLB account in Ballpark app
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is successfully logged in with MLB account in Ballpark app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is on the Wallet tab and taps on the event, but the api call to the address verification service fails
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app shows a dialog that the user was an error with the ability to retry the api call

title: Open My Account from Trigger Email Verification Success
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a successful email verification trigger 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24178)
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps "Go to your MLB Account"
custom_expected:
THEN the My Account view is opened 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/24184)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is in the Wallet Tab 
AND the user taps on the email sent message which shows "Go to My Account"
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to My MLB Account Emails page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user back navigates from MLB Account Emails page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user is directed to Wallet Tab

title: Initial Load Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Wallet Tab and clicks on View All button
custom_steps: WHEN Wallet Details list is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed (Android only)
THEN a service call (verify using Charles) is made to box office service with refresh == false
THEN UI is updated and tickets are shown

title: Initial Load Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab and clicks on View All Button
custom_steps: WHEN Wallet Details list is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed (Android only)
THEN box office service is forced to failed (using Charles to overwrite return code)
THEN Retry message/option is displayed (Android only)
THEN no tickets are displayed because initial load and no tickets are cached

title: Initial Load No Network Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab and clicks on View All button and has no network connectivity
custom_steps: WHEN User views Wallet Detail List for first time
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed (Android only)
THEN displays message about no network connectivity (Android Only)
THEN no tickets are displayed on Wallet Tab since none where initially loaded

title: Manual Refresh Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Wallet Tab with tickets
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls down to refresh
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN a service call (verify using Charles) is made to box office service with refresh == true
THEN UI is updated and tickets are shown

title: Manual Refresh Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab with tickets and has network connectivity
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls to refresh and using Charles return error code 500
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN box office service is forced to failed (using Charles to overwrite return code)
THEN Retry message/option is displayed
THEN user tickets remain displayed on Wallet Tab

title: Manual Refresh No Network Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab with tickets and app is in airplane mode (no network connectivity)
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls to refresh
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN the snackbar is displayed with no network error and retry is available
THEN the tickets remain displayed

title: Auto Refresh Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Today Tab and has tickets for Today
custom_steps: WHEN User navigates to the Wallet Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the loading indicator is not displayed
THEN tickets will be displayed
THEN a service call to the BoxOffice Service will be made with refresh == false (verify using Charles)

title: Auto Refresh Error (No Network)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user loads the app from cold start (not background)
AND is on the Home Page with cached tickets

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN user opens the app with network enabled
AND user views the tickets to have them cached
AND user closes/quits BP app (not backgrounded)
WHEN user disables the network
AND user opens BP app 
AND user navigates to the wallet tab with no network
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] THEN the wallet tab should not display error message 

[Android] THEN the wallet tab displays an error message

THEN the wallet tab should continue to show cached tickets
THEN the wallet tab should not display a loading indication

title: Auto Refresh Error (Network and No Network)
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user has started the app and navigates to the wallet tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN you turn off the internet while in the wallet tab and navigate to the home tab and then back to the wallet tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
[iOS] THEN the wallet tab should not display error message

[Android] THEN the wallet tab displays an error message

THEN tickets should still be available. 
THEN no loading indicator is displayed.

title: Initial Load Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Wallet Tab and clicks on View All button
custom_steps: WHEN Wallet Details list is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN a service call (verify using Charles) is made to box office service with refresh == false
THEN UI is updated and tickets are shown

title: Initial Load Error with cached tickets
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab and clicks on View All Button
custom_steps: WHEN Wallet Details list is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN box office service is forced to failed (using Charles to overwrite return code)
THEN Retry message/option is displayed with something went wrong message
THEN user cached tickets remain displayed on Wallet Detail List

title: Initial Load No Network Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Tab and clicks on View All button and has no network connectivity
custom_steps: WHEN User views Wallet Detail List for first time
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed (Android only)
THEN Retry snackbar is displayed with message about no network connectivity (Android only)
THEN cached user tickets remain displayed on Wallet Detail List

title: Auto Refresh Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Wallet Tab and clicks "View All" button
custom_steps: WHEN the Wallet Detail List is displayed
custom_expected:
THEN no loading indicator is displayed
THEN the wallet detail list is presented
THEN box service call is made to get ticket details

title: Manual Refresh Successful
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on the Wallet Details List
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls down to refresh
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN a service call (verify using Charles) is made to box office service with refresh == true
THEN UI is updated and tickets are shown

title: Manual Refresh w/ Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Detail List and has network connectivity
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls to refresh and using Charles return error code 500
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN box office service is forced to failed (using Charles to overwrite return code) and refresh == true
THEN Retry message/option is displayed with something went wrong message
THEN user tickets remain displayed on Wallet Detail List

title: Manual Refresh No Network Error
custom_preconds: GIVEN User is on Wallet Detail List and has no network connectivity (airplane mode)
custom_steps: WHEN User pulls to refresh
custom_expected:
THEN loading indicator is displayed
THEN Retry snack bar displays message "Network Unavailable, please check your connection"
THEN user tickets remain displayed on Wallet Detail List

title: [IOS ONLY] Swipe Back Support
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is inside the Wallet navigation tab
AND is on a screen that contains a back button in the top-left corner
custom_steps: WHEN the user swipes in from the right side of the screen
custom_expected: THEN the user will be taken to the previous screen
